_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.8:1.4]: One meditator who is skilled in immersion but not in practicing carefully for it
Another meditator who is skilled in practicing carefully but not in immersion
Another meditator who is unskilled in both immersion and practicing carefully
Another meditator who is skilled in both immersion and practicing carefully
